mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friends(userId, targetId, friendStatus) VALUES (#{userId}, #{targetId}, 'REQUEST'), (#{targetId}, #{userId}, 'RECEIVE')
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(friendStatus),'NONE') AS friendStatus FROM friends WHERE userId = #{userId} AND targetId= #{targetId}
mapper.update: UPDATE friends SET friendStatus = #{friendStatus} WHERE (userId = #{userId} AND targetId = #{targetId}) OR (userId = #{targetId} AND targetId = #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM friends WHERE (userId = #{userId} AND targetId = #{targetId}) OR (userId = #{targetId} AND targetId = #{userId})
